intro: Psychotria oaxacana, commonly known as the Oaxaca psychotria, is a flowering plant species native to Mexico. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical and subtropical regions. Psychotria oaxacana is also noted for its potential ethnobotanical uses, though further research is needed to confirm its properties.
